in_app_notification_settings.subscribe_settings: Settings to automatically subscribe (Receive notifications) to pages

default_subscribe_rules.page_create: Subscribe to the page when you create it.

common_settings.common_misspellings: Textlint rules to find common misspellings from Wikipedia.
common_settings.max_comma: Textlint rule is that limit maximum ten(,) count of sentence. Default: 4
common_settings.sentence_length: Textlint rules that limit Maximum Length of Sentence. Default: 100
common_settings.en_capitalization: Textlint rule that check capitalization in english text.
common_settings.no_unmatched_pair: Textlint rule that check unmatched pairs like （ and ]
common_settings.date_weekday_mismatch: Textlint rule that found mismatch between date and weekday.
common_settings.no_kangxi_radicals: Textlint rule to prevent using kangxi radicals.
common_settings.no_surrogate_pair: Detects surrogate pairs (D800-DBFF and DC00-DFFF)　in sentences.
common_settings.no_zero_width_spaces: Textlint rule that disallow zero width spaces.
common_settings.period_in_list_item: Textlint rule that check with or without period in list item.
common_settings.use_si_units: Use of units other than SI unit units is prohibited.

japanese_settings.ja_no_abusage: Textlint rules to check for common misuse.
japanese_settings.ja_hiragana_keishikimeishi: Textlint rules to check easy-to-read Keishikimeishi(pronouns) written in Hiragana than Kanji.
japanese_settings.ja_no_inappropriate_words: Textlint rules to check for inappropriate expressions
japanese_settings.ja_no_mixed_period: Textlint rules to check that a paragraph always has a punctuation mark at the end.
japanese_settings.ja_no_redundant_expression: Textlint rules that prohibits redundant expressions. Redundant expressions are expressions that make sense even if they are omitted from the sentence.
japanese_settings.max_kanji_continuous_len: Textlint rules that limits the maximum number of consecutive Kanji. Default: 5
japanese_settings.max_ten: Textlint rule is that limit maximum ten(、) count of sentence.
japanese_settings.no_double_negative_ja: Textlint rules that detects double negation.
japanese_settings.no_doubled_conjunction: Textlint rules to check duplicated same conjunctions.
japanese_settings.no_doubled_joshi: Textlint rules that checks that the same particle appears consecutively in one sentence.
japanese_settings.no_dropping_the_ra: Textlint rules that detects the word dropping the ra.
japanese_settings.no_hankaku_kana: Textlint rules that disallow to use Half-width kana.
japanese_settings.prefer_tari_tari: Textlint rules that checks tari tari.
japanese_settings.no_mixed_zenkaku_and_hankaku_alphabet: Check for mixed full-width and half-width alphabets.
japanese_settings.no_nfd: textlint rule that disallow to use NFD like UTF8-MAC Sonant mark.
